titles.title: A bill for the relief of Patricia Macarelli, in her capacity as administratrix of the estate of Edward Brian Halloran.
A bill for the relief of Patricia Macarelli, in her capacity as administratrix of the estate of Edward Brian Halloran.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Provides for the relief of Patricia Macarelli, in her capacity as administratrix of the estate of Edward Brian Halloran.
